about_company.title: Company Profile
about_company.description: Founded in 2016 by Hüseyin ERYİĞİT, POLGEN Biotechnology Inc. continues its innovative work in biotechnology. Alongside its services, it aims to become a successful company in its field by continuously renewing itself with R&D projects.

mission_vision.title: Vision & Mission
mission_vision.description: POLGEN Biotechnology Inc. was founded as a start-up by Hüseyin ERYİĞİT in 2016 and continues innovative studies in biotechnology. It aims to be a successful company in its field by constantly renewing itself with R&D projects.

ar_ge.title: TÜBİTAK-TEYDEB 1507: Development of CRISPR-Based Genome Editing Kit
ar_ge.description: POLGEN is conducting advanced R&D projects aimed at enhancing genome editing and biotechnological tools, creating accessible, efficient, and innovative solutions.
ar_ge.project_1_description: POLGEN is developing state-of-the-art CRISPR tools to provide researchers with precise genome editing capabilities for both academic and industrial applications.
ar_ge.project_2_description: Innovative genetic engineering and CRISPR solutions tailored to meet specific needs in biotechnology and medicine.
ar_ge.project_3_description: Comprehensive microbiome studies and genetic analysis services designed to accelerate research and diagnostics in diverse fields.

covid_19.title: POLGEN Coronavirus Detection/Test Kit
covid_19.description: This kit is developed for the detection of SARS-CoV-2 from RNA samples obtained from human specimens. The reaction time is about 1 hour and varies slightly based on the qPCR device used.

sections.title: Coronavirus Test Kit
sections.description: The POLGEN Coronavirus Test Kit utilizes advanced qPCR technology for rapid and accurate detection of SARS-CoV-2, ensuring reliable results for healthcare professionals.

sections.title: Big Data Solutions
sections.description: POLGEN provides innovative big data analysis services including de novo genome assembly, RNASeq analysis, and gene ontology profiling to accelerate research and development.

services.title: Our Services
services.service_1_desc: Comprehensive biocompatibility analyses tailored to your needs.
services.service_2_desc: Advanced sequencing services for cutting-edge research.
services.service_3_desc: Comprehensive bioinformatics analyses to support your research.
services.service_5_desc: Accurate and reliable Covid-19 detection kits.
services.service_6_desc: Specialized kits for detecting Monkeypox virus.
